text: Bonnie Christensen (January 23, 1951 â€“ January 12, 2015) was an American author and illustrator. She best known for writing biographies and other illustrated non-fiction books for children and young adults. She was born in Saranac Lake, New York. Christensen died of ovarian cancer in Williston, Vermont, aged 63. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1951 births Category:2015 deaths Category:Deaths from ovarian cancer Category:American painters Category:Writers from New York (state) Category:Cancer deaths in Vermont
